trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"></xref> types to UI Automation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
A new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
Gets the control type for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.ComboBox"></xref> enumeration value.
Gets a collection of child elements.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren"></xref>.
A collection of child elements.
Gets the name of the class that defines the type that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName"></xref>.
A string that contains "ComboBox".
Gets the control pattern for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>.
One of the enumeration values.
If pattern is or , this method returns a reference to the current instance of the ; otherwise, this method calls the base implementation on .

Sets the keyboard input focus on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"></xref> control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref> object.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"></xref> control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref> object cannot receive focus.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState"></xref> for the current element.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
`true` if the value is read-only; `false` if it can be modified.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
The string value of a control.
This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
A string value of the control.
